group_1.narration: The maid cafe was gradually@preparing to close.
There was nothing we@could do to keep it open...
But I knew what I had to do...

group_1.textLeft: *Sniff* I was finally just starting to get@some fans.
Our super-amazing masters are about to@arrive.
Stop looking so gloomy,[chara:305302:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305302:motion_100][chara:305302:lipSynch_1] or I'm gonna be@reeeally mad!
Even though we're going to close...
No, BECAUSE we're gonna close, we've gotta@show them our smiles until the very end!
Because we're totally professional, super@adorable maids!

group_1.narration: We had to serve our masters with@a cute smile, until the veeery end!
That's all we could do, since we@knew our special time there wasn't@gonna last much longer.
Then...@On the horrible day we were closing,@I had to go up on center stage for@our last performance ever.

group_1.textCenter: [chara:305302:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Thanks sooo much everyone, for coming to@see us!
This will be our very, very last show...
But I'm so super-duper happy that so many@of our masters came to see us!

group_1.narration: The show was a big hit.
More masters than we'd ever seen at@the same time came to see us that day.
Everyone gave their best performance,@putting on their best smiles.
Then...
After the performance, and once@all of the masters had left the cafe,@we all gathered and cried together.

group_1.textLeft: Not yet... I want to stay here a bit longer.

group_1.textRight: I'll be in the back room. Let me know when@you're going to leave.
I'll be leaving, now... See you at school.

group_1.narration: The empty maid cafe was so silent...@It was hard to believe@how lively it was earlier.
There were no more cheering voices,@or lamenting about the cafe closing.@Everyone was gone.
I went up on the stage and@it felt so big with just me on it.@All of the vacant seats in the@audience made me really sad.

group_1.textCenter: (I'll go back to being my cheerful self@tomorrow!)

group_1.textRight: Whether it's over or not is up to you, Ikumi.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey? What are you doing here?

group_1.textRight: Did you remember what I said before?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't have any time for that.

group_1.textRight: "You can use your wish on something other@than making your dream come true."
You seem very attached to this cafe.
If you wish for it, it can stay in business.

group_1.narration: At that moment, I remembered@the stage I stood on earlier,@and the faces of the younger maids.
My heart hurt just thinking@about how disappointed and upset@everyone was about the cafe closing.
This place...@it was important to everyone, not just me.
I couldn't accept that such an@important place could just disappear,@especially if it wasn't even our fault.

group_1.textRight: Well? Have you thought about your wish?

group_1.textLeft: I want to keep the cafe open...
I want it to stay open without any property@or ownership problems.
Please, don't let it close down!

group_1.narration: That's how I became a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, I wonder why we're here? I'm@super-duper curious!

group_1.textRight: I'm amazed you try to stay in character@even when you're not performing...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:305301:motion_200][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]This is just how I really am, honest!

group_1.textCenter: I have good news for all of you today.

group_1.narration: I knew my wish had been granted.
After all...
The landlord saw our final@performance and loved it.@He offered to sell the land and building@to the school at a generous price.@The school accepted and renovations began.
Such a convenient outcome@never would have happened@under normal circumstances.
